thread.section_title: WowVendor.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WowVendor.com | wowvendor.com | 6 of 9
thread.title: Austin

author: Austin
title: Austin
text: I ordered a heroic EN clear for the feat of strength on Sunday the 15th (so it had to be done before reset on the 17th), they contacted me immediately and got it set up for Monday night before reset. I got aotc and quite a few pieces of gear, it all went over very smoothly. I shopped around for a bit before deciding to go with these guys and I'm really happy with the choice I made. They were extremely nice and have made me a very happy customer. Can't wait to use their services again very soon.
